name: Webbosaurus
overview:
Webbosaurus offers its clients professional social media monitoring. Based on the results of the social media monitoring Webbosaurus consults companies and agencies in the fields of social media and digital communication. Founded in 2009, Webbosaurus is one of the first agencies for social media monitoring in germany. Since then Webbosaurus monitors the reputation of brands and products within the social web. Therefore clients benefit of perennial experiences, but above all from the quality and quantity of the results.

The social media monitoring process of Webbosaurus consists of 3 main steps: 1. an own crawling technology consigns the searching results for the different keywords, in addition spam and activities from bots are filtered; 2. the remaining results are manually checked by skilled analysts, above, they categorize and evaluate all results; 3. afterwards clients can access the data online (Tool: Webboboard), compare, filter, export and work with the results.

In addition Webbosaurus offers target group analysis, market analysis and evaluation of campaigns. Also, customized recommendations can be given.
